short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AIR mail enables interaction entry on the go against projects and companies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The AIR mail enables interaction entry on the go against projects and companies. The plugin allows seamless integration of your project email interactions with baseline BNC data and makes it possible to track all your email communications on a project with a single mouse click.
